'use client' import { Card, CardContent, CardDescription, CardFooter, CardHeader, CardTitle, } from '@gentleduck/registry-ui-duckui/card' import { ChartConfig, ChartContainer, ChartTooltip, ChartTooltipContent } from '@gentleduck/registry-ui-duckui/chart' import { TrendingUp } from 'lucide-react' import { PolarAngleAxis, PolarGrid, Radar, RadarChart } from 'recharts' const chartData = [ { month: 'January', desktop: 186, mobile: 160 }, { month: 'February', desktop: 185, mobile: 170 }, { month: 'March', desktop: 207, mobile: 180 }, { month: 'April', desktop: 173, mobile: 160 }, { month: 'May', desktop: 160, mobile: 190 }, { month: 'June', desktop: 174, mobile: 204 }, ] const chartConfig = { desktop: { label: 'Desktop', color: 'var(--chart-1)', }, mobile: { label: 'Mobile', color: 'var(--chart-2)', }, } satisfies ChartConfig export default function Component() { return ( Radar Chart - Lines Only Showing total visitors for the last 6 months } />
Trending up by 5.2% this month
January - June 2024
 ) }
